Title: Lockdown
Plot: On John Colliers' birthday NTAC receives threatening e-mails and gets attacked by terror. Kyle is concerned that an innocent will be convicted for killing Collier. Maia gets a mysterious infection and is treated at NTAC. Isabelle has broken off her special communication with her mother and transfers it to her father. At school a girl is very interested in Kyle.
GuestStars: Colleen Winton,  Karen Austin,  Tyler McClendon,  Rob Lee,  Arnold  Cheng,  Leanne Adachi,  Tony Parsons,  Hiro Kanagawa,  Tom Verica,  Roger R. Cross,  Sean Devine,  Valerie Sing Turner,  Mark Gibbon,  Cheryl Mu
